thing.title: Tripod Critter
thing.author: MaskedRetriever
thing.description: I thought I'd try demoing things you can do with Blender's subsurface capabilities-- this little guy should print without supports, although you might need to drop the feet to the ground a bit-- skeinforge didn't see one of them 'till the third layer or so...Edit:Zach took it into AOI and leveled off the feet for me:thingiverse.com/thing:439Thanks, Zach!
